title: Australia: Citibank to Sponsor The Good Food & Wine Show 2013 in Melbourne and Sydney
summary: Sydney - The Good Food & Wine Show today announced Citibank as primary sponsorship partner for its Melbourne and Sydney events in 2013.
tag-1: Australia: Citibank to Sponsor The Good Food & Wine Show 2013 in Melbourne and Sydney
tag-2: Sydney – The Good Food & Wine Show today announced Citibank as primary sponsorship partner for its Melbourne and Sydney events in 2013.
tag-3: The Good Food & Wine Show, now in its 13th year, celebrates Australia's love affair with good food and those who create it. This year's show will feature a host of old crowd favorites along with a number of new attractions and experiences, including appearances from international and home-grown celebrity chefs such as Ainsley Harriott, Curtis Stone, Donna Hay, Tobie Puttock, Maggie Beer, Miguel Maestre, Julie Goodwin and Michelle Bridges.
tag-4: The Melbourne show will run from June 7-10 and the Sydney event from June 28-30, 2013.
tag-5: Linda Duncombe, Director of Digital Banking, Marketing & Customer Experience for Citibank in Australia, said, "We are delighted to partner with The Good Food & Wine Show, a highly anticipated event which has become an annual staple for many Australians who want to be part of the fun.
tag-6: "The show builds on the long term support we provide the food and wine industry through our Citibank Dining Program. The program encourages Australians to dine out more often with a free bottle of award-winning wine at hundreds of partner restaurants across the country."
tag-7: To celebrate the partnership, the Citibank Dining Program will be giving visitors to the Melbourne and Sydney Good Food & Wine Show the chance to win $10,000 worth of wine. Visitors will have a chance to enter the competition at the show and sample some of the delights of the Program.
tag-8: With a wide range of enticing attractions, unique experiences, tasty samples and interactive activities, The Good Food & Wine Show is not to be missed in 2013.
tag-10: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
tag-11: Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com | Twitter: @Citi | YouTube: www.youtube.com/citi | Blog: http://blog.citigroup.com | Facebook: www.facebook.com/citi | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/citi
